verses.verse: וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after יָשַׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> sat דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> Now it came to pass as David בְּבֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> in his house וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֜יד <S%H1732><s%> that David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נָתָ֣ן <S%H5416><s%> to Nathan הַנָּבִ֗יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אָנֹכִ֤י <S%H595><s%> I יוֹשֵׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> Lo I dwell בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in an house הָֽאֲרָזִ֔ים <S%H729><s%> made of cedar וַאֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> but the ark בְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> is under יְרִיעֽוֹת׃ <S%H3407><s%> [remaineth] under curtains

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said נָתָן֙ <S%H5416><s%> Then Nathan אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> unto David כֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> is in בִּֽלְבָבְךָ֖ <S%H3824><s%> all that [is] in thine heart עֲשֵׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> Do כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> for God עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with ס

וַֽיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> came בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> And it came to pass the same night הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> the same וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> that the word אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נָתָ֖ן <S%H5416><s%> came to Nathan לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

לֵ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go וְאָמַרְתָּ֙ <S%H559><s%> and tell אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> David עַבְדִּ֔י <S%H5650><s%> my servant כֹּ֖ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not אַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> you תִּבְנֶה־ <S%H1129><s%> Thou shalt not build לִּ֥י הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> me an house לָשָֽׁבֶת׃ <S%H3427><s%> to dwell in

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> have not יָשַׁ֙בְתִּי֙ <S%H3427><s%> For I have not dwelt in בְּבַ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> an house מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> since הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> since the day אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> i הֶעֱלֵ֙יתִי֙ <S%H5927><s%> that I brought up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> to this וָֽאֶהְיֶ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> have gone מֵאֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> but have gone from tent אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> to tent וּמִמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <S%H4908><s%> and from [one] tabernacle

בְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> where הִתְהַלַּכְתִּי֮ <S%H1980><s%> Wheresoever I have walked בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> with all Israel הֲדָבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> I a word דִּבַּ֗רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> spake אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אַחַד֙ <S%H259><s%> to any שֹׁפְטֵ֣י <S%H8199><s%> of the judges יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom צִוִּ֛יתִי <S%H6680><s%> whom I commanded לִרְע֥וֹת <S%H7462><s%> to feed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> my people לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying לָ֛מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not בְנִיתֶ֥ם <S%H1129><s%> Why have ye not built לִ֖י בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> me an house אֲרָזִֽים׃ <S%H729><s%> made of cedar

וְ֠עַתָּה <S%H6258><s%> Now כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus תֹאמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Now therefore thus shalt thou say לְעַבְדִּ֣י <S%H5650><s%> unto my servant לְדָוִ֗יד <S%H1732><s%> David ס כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I לְקַחְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H3947><s%> I took מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַנָּוֶ֔ה <S%H5116><s%> thee from the sheepcote מִֽן־ <S%H4480><s%> from אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> [even] from following הַצֹּ֑אן <S%H6629><s%> the sheep לִהְי֣וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become נָגִ֔יד <S%H5057><s%> that thou shouldest be ruler עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> over עַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> over my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וָֽאֶהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> have been עִמְּךָ֗ <S%H5973><s%> with בְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who הָלַ֔כְתָּ <S%H1980><s%> And I have been with thee whithersoever thou hast walked וָאַכְרִ֥ית <S%H3772><s%> and have cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אוֹיְבֶ֖יךָ <S%H341><s%> all thine enemies מִפָּנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> from before וְעָשִׂ֤יתִֽי <S%H6213><s%> thee and have made לְךָ֙ שֵׁ֔ם <S%H8034><s%> thee a name כְּשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> like the name הַגְּדוֹלִ֖ים <S%H1419><s%> of the great men אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> that [are] in the earth

וְשַׂמְתִּ֣י <S%H7760><s%> Also I will ordain מָ֠קוֹם <S%H4725><s%> a place לְעַמִּ֨י <S%H5971><s%> for my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וּנְטַעְתִּ֙יהוּ֙ <S%H5193><s%> and will plant וְשָׁכַ֣ן <S%H7931><s%> them and they shall dwell תַּחְתָּ֔יו <S%H8478><s%> place וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִרְגַּ֖ז <S%H7264><s%> in their place and shall be moved ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יוֹסִ֤יפוּ <S%H3254><s%> them any more בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> no more neither shall the children עַוְלָה֙ <S%H5766><s%> of wickedness לְבַלֹּת֔וֹ <S%H1086><s%> waste כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> as בָּרִאשׁוֹנָֽה׃ <S%H7223><s%> as at the beginning

וּלְמִיָּמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> And since the time אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> i צִוִּ֤יתִי <S%H6680><s%> that I commanded שֹֽׁפְטִים֙ <S%H8199><s%> judges עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> [to be] over my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וְהִכְנַ֖עְתִּי <S%H3665><s%> Moreover I will subdue אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אוֹיְבֶ֑יךָ <S%H341><s%> all thine enemies וָאַגִּ֣ד <S%H5046><s%> Furthermore I tell לָ֔ךְ וּבַ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> thee an house יִֽבְנֶה־ <S%H1129><s%> will build לְּךָ֥ יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> thee that the LORD

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When מָלְא֤וּ <S%H4390><s%> be expired יָמֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass when thy days לָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> go עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲבֹתֶ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> [to be] with thy fathers וַהֲקִֽימוֹתִ֤י <S%H6965><s%> that I will raise up אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> זַרְעֲךָ֙ <S%H2233><s%> thy seed אַחֲרֶ֔יךָ <S%H310><s%> after אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> will be of מִבָּנֶ֑יךָ <S%H1121><s%> thee which shall be of thy sons וַהֲכִינוֹתִ֖י <S%H3559><s%> and I will establish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַלְכוּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4438><s%> his kingdom

ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> He יִבְנֶה־ <S%H1129><s%> He shall build לִּ֖י בָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> me an house וְכֹנַנְתִּ֥י <S%H3559><s%> and I will stablish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כִּסְא֖וֹ <S%H3678><s%> his throne עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ever

אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I אֶֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לּ֣וֹ לְאָ֔ב <S%H1><s%> I will be his father וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לִּ֣י לְבֵ֑ן <S%H1121><s%> and he shall be my son וְחַסְדִּי֙ <S%H2617><s%> my mercy לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and I will not אָסִ֣יר <S%H5493><s%> away מֵֽעִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who הֲסִיר֔וֹתִי <S%H5493><s%> from him as I took מֵאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who הָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְפָנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> [it] from [him] that was before

וְהַֽעֲמַדְתִּ֛יהוּ <S%H5975><s%> But I will settle בְּבֵיתִ֥י <S%H1004><s%> him in mine house וּבְמַלְכוּתִ֖י <S%H4438><s%> and in my kingdom עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for הָעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever וְכִסְא֕וֹ <S%H3678><s%> and his throne יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become נָכ֖וֹן <S%H3559><s%> shall be established עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> evermore

כְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> to all הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> According to all these words הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וּכְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> to all הֶחָז֣וֹן <S%H2377><s%> and according to all this vision הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> so דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> speak נָתָ֖ן <S%H5416><s%> so did Nathan אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִֽיד׃ <S%H1732><s%> unto David פ

וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> came הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> And David וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and sat לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who אֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Who [am] I O LORD אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> God וּמִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> and what בֵיתִ֔י <S%H1004><s%> and what [is] mine house כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that הֲבִיאֹתַ֖נִי <S%H935><s%> that thou hast brought עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הֲלֹֽם׃ <S%H1988><s%> this

וַתִּקְטַ֨ן <S%H6994><s%> And [yet] this was a small thing זֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> in בְּעֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5869><s%> in thine eyes אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> O God וַתְּדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> for thou hast [also] spoken עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> house עַבְדְּךָ֖ <S%H5650><s%> of thy servant's לְמֵרָח֑וֹק <S%H7350><s%> for a great while to come וּרְאִיתַ֗נִי <S%H7200><s%> and hast regarded כְּת֧וֹר <S%H8448><s%> me according to the estate הָאָדָ֛ם <S%H120><s%> of a man הַֽמַּעֲלָ֖ה <S%H4609><s%> of high degree יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> God

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What יּוֹסִ֨יף <S%H3254><s%> [speak] more ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> still דָּוִ֛יד <S%H1732><s%> David אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> to לְכָב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> to thee for the honour אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> thy servant וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> עַבְדְּךָ֥ <S%H5650><s%> your servant יָדָֽעְתָּ׃ <S%H3045><s%> acknowledge

יְהוָ֕ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD בַּעֲב֤וּר <S%H5668><s%> sake עַבְדְּךָ֙ <S%H5650><s%> for thy servant's וּֽכְלִבְּךָ֔ <S%H3820><s%> sake and according to thine own heart עָשִׂ֕יתָ <S%H6213><s%> hast thou done אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגְּדוּלָּ֖ה <S%H1420><s%> all this greatness הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לְהֹדִ֖יעַ <S%H3045><s%> in making known אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגְּדֻלּֽוֹת׃ <S%H1420><s%> all [these] great things

יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> there כָּמ֔וֹךָ <S%H3644><s%> like וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> is none אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> [there is] none like thee neither [is there any] God זוּלָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H2108><s%> beside בְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> we שָׁמַ֖עְנוּ <S%H8085><s%> thee according to all that we have heard בְּאָזְנֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H241><s%> with our ears

וּמִי֙ <S%H4310><s%> and what כְּעַמְּךָ֣ <S%H5971><s%> [is] like thy people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel גּ֥וֹי <S%H1471><s%> nation אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> And what one בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the earth אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> whom הָלַ֨ךְ <S%H1980><s%> went הָאֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> whom God לִפְדּ֧וֹת <S%H6299><s%> to redeem ל֣וֹ עָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> [to be] his own people לָשׂ֤וּם <S%H7760><s%> to make לְךָ֙ שֵׁ֚ם <S%H8034><s%> thee a name גְּדֻלּ֣וֹת <S%H1420><s%> of greatness וְנֹרָא֔וֹת <S%H3372><s%> and terribleness לְגָרֵ֗שׁ <S%H1644><s%> by driving out מִפְּנֵ֧י <S%H6440><s%> from before עַמְּךָ֛ <S%H5971><s%> thy people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom פָּדִ֥יתָ <S%H6299><s%> whom thou hast redeemed מִמִּצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> Egypt גּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> nations

וַ֠תִּתֵּן <S%H5414><s%> didst thou make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמְּךָ֨ <S%H5971><s%> For thy people יִשְׂרָאֵ֧ל ׀ <S%H3478><s%> Israel לְךָ֛ לְעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> thine own people עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> ever וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> O יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> and thou LORD הָיִ֥יתָ <S%H1961><s%> became לָהֶ֖ם לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> becamest their God

וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> Now יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Therefore now LORD הַדָּבָ֗ר <S%H1697><s%> let the thing אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> you דִּבַּ֤רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> that thou hast spoken עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning עַבְדְּךָ֙ <S%H5650><s%> concerning thy servant וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and concerning בֵּית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> and concerning his house יֵאָמֵ֖ן <S%H539><s%> be established עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> ever וַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> and do כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you דִּבַּֽרְתָּ׃ <S%H1696><s%> as thou hast said

וְ֠יֵֽאָמֵן <S%H539><s%> Let it even be established וְיִגְדַּ֨ל <S%H1431><s%> may be magnified שִׁמְךָ֤ <S%H8034><s%> that thy name עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָם֙ <S%H5769><s%> ever לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> [is] the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> [even] a God לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> to Israel וּבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> and [let] the house דָּוִ֥יד <S%H1732><s%> of David עַבְדְּךָ֖ <S%H5650><s%> thy servant נָכ֥וֹן <S%H3559><s%> [be] established לְפָנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> O אֱלֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> For thou O my God גָּלִ֙יתָ֙ <S%H1540><s%> advertise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹ֣זֶן <S%H241><s%> hearing עַבְדְּךָ֔ <S%H5650><s%> thy servant לִבְנ֥וֹת <S%H1129><s%> that thou wilt build ל֖וֹ בָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> him an house עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> after that מָצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> hath found עַבְדְּךָ֔ <S%H5650><s%> therefore thy servant לְהִתְפַּלֵּ֖ל <S%H6419><s%> [in his heart] to pray לְפָנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> Now יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And now LORD אַתָּה־ <S%H859><s%> you ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> You הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> thou art God וַתְּדַבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> and hast promised עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto עַבְדְּךָ֔ <S%H5650><s%> unto thy servant הַטּוֹבָ֖ה <S%H2896><s%> this goodness הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> and now הוֹאַ֙לְתָּ֙ <S%H2974><s%> Now therefore let it please לְבָרֵךְ֙ <S%H1288><s%> thee to bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house עַבְדְּךָ֔ <S%H5650><s%> of thy servant לִהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> may continue לְעוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> thee for ever לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> that it may be before כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> O יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD בֵּרַ֔כְתָּ <S%H1288><s%> for thou blessest וּמְבֹרָ֖ךְ <S%H1288><s%> and [it shall be] blessed לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever פ
